remarks: - Lemma for ~ ostth : trivial case.  (Not that the proof is trivial, but that we are proving that the function is trivial.)  If ` F ` is equal to ` 1 ` on the primes, then by complete induction and the multiplicative property ~ abvmul of the absolute value, ` F ` is equal to ` 1 ` on all the integers, and ~ ostthlem1 extends this to the other rational numbers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2014.)

ostth.k $e |- K = ( x e. QQ |-> if ( x = 0 , 0 , 1 ) ) $.
